analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
upādāna duka ādi sani dassana ttika

original: Noupādānaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no upādānam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca no upādānaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe vipāke ekam pe avigate eka
